titles.title: Mule deer and white-tail deer hybrid data

descriptions.description: Genetic analysis of mule deer and white-tail deer in Alberta at 40 species discriminating SNP (single nucleotide polymorphism) loci. Included in this dataset is the genotype file and associated R script demonstrating analyses for the simulation aspect of the study. Empirical results can be reproduced using the genotypes and adapting the R code as needed.
